input_text:
Job Title: Product Marketing Manager

Location: Irvine, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About Finfare

Finfare is dedicated to empowering SMBs, by providing the ultimate expense management solution for growing businesses seeking to streamline their financial operations and maximize cash back rewards. Finfare offers easy expense tracking, personalized spend controls, seamless accounting integration, powerful analytics, and reliable charge card services. Our cardholders can tap into our vast network of reward program publishers and card-linked merchant offers, ensuring even bigger cash back rewards for their business.

We are always working on redefining the boundaries of digital financial services and aim to stay one step ahead in the ever-evolving fintech landscape.

About The Role

We are seeking a highly motivated and strategic Product Marketing Manager to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in shaping, executing, and refining our go-to-market plans for our expanding product portfolio. Collaborating closely with our Product team, you will drive market research, product positioning, messaging, pricing, and channel strategy. We are seeking a seasoned professional who can provide thought leadership, foster cross-functional collaboration, and be an individual contributor as needed.

Responsibilities

Lead, develop, and execute go-to-market strategies that drive the success of our various new products in new markets.Collaborate closely with the Product, Marketing, Sales, and Customer Success teams to shape go-to-market plans, including market research, product positioning, consumer research, sizing up the opportunity, messaging, pricing, and channel strategy.Work with various stakeholders to bridge the gap between product and marketing, ensuring alignment and effective communication by being a subject matter expert on technical product documentation.Refine our product positioning through competitive analysis and develop a comprehensive GTM strategy to align products with their ideal targeted audiences.Strong skill sets in technical writing and full product life cycle management.Support product launches with effective communication, product content creation, and enablement for cross-functional teams.Lead content creation, market research, and cross-functional enablement to ensure the product's value proposition is effectively communicated.Content Development: Create high-quality marketing collateral, including sales enablement materials, website content, product presentations, and case studies to effectively communicate product benefits and featuresDevelop and maintain a product content library and support sales teams with product-related materials.Other duties as assigned.

Qualifications And Requirements

5+ years of experience in product marketing, must have a strong background in SaaS fintech B2B products.Start-up experience is strongly preferred.Excellent written and verbal communication skills - specifically strong technical writing skills closing the gap between Product, Marketing, other cross-functional departments, consumers, and businesses.A data-driven mindset, with proficiency in marketing technology tools and full cycle end-to-end product lifecycle.Familiarity with fintech, SaaS/BaaS industries, and the ability to navigate complex stakeholder environments.

Bonus Points

MBA (preferred but not mandatory).

Compensation

The salary range for this position is $90k-$130k+ (depending on experience).

Benefits At Finfare

Competitive health, vision, and dental benefits (covering 100% premium for employee and all dependent(s))Unlimited PTO  401K (with employer matching) Catered lunches 3+ times a weekHealth and wellness reimbursementParental leave  Employee stock purchase plan (if applicable)  Work sponsorship (if applicable)Other employee perks

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Product Marketing Manager
output_json.summary: Join Finfare, a fintech company empowering SMBs with expense management solutions.
soft_skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Closing the gap between Product, Marketing, other cross-functional departments, consumers, and businesses
job_responsibilities: Lead, develop, and execute go-to-market strategies
Bridge the gap between product and marketing
benefits: Competitive health, vision, and dental benefits
output_json.company_information: Finfare is dedicated to empowering SMBs with expense management solutions.
